remembered
the show and you were already done.-=-



Don't be sad. I'm sure Shrek was MUCH better.



Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Sandra on Alan Colmes
messages.msgSnippet: oops.. not sad that I was watching a movie with my kids... sad that I missed you ... -- One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar -
messages.messageBody:
oops.. not sad that I was watching a movie with my kids...

sad that I missed you

the show and you were already done. I can't get the podcast to work either.

: (

Erica

I have to second that. I thought you made some great points. You're a
great inspiration and indeed a great spokesperson for unschooling!

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Sandra on Alan Colmes
messages.msgSnippet: -=-and talking to the kids and Keith afterwards (he didn t listen, but I told him how I thought it went). I went to bed before long.-=- Oh wait.... He didn t
messages.messageBody:
-=-and talking to the kids and Keith
afterwards (he didn't listen, but I told him how I thought it went).
I went to bed before long.-=-

Oh wait....

He didn't listen to the radio show, but he did listen to me. <g>

Keith had had people over to sing from 7:00 to 8:30, and was tired
from that and a long day of work, so he opted out of listening to me
on the radio. I don't mind. It was the same old thing.



Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Sandra on Alan Colmes
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you for the positive feedback.  I was exhausted after that was all over, after the adrenaline and frustration, and listening to the whole three hours of
messages.messageBody:
Thank you for the positive feedback. I was exhausted after that was
all over, after the adrenaline and frustration, and listening to the
whole three hours of the show, and talking to the kids and Keith
afterwards (he didn't listen, but I told him how I thought it went).
I went to bed before long.

I've written a follow-up here: http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/
2007/12/mountain-view-and-radio-afterword.html

If the mailing format cuts that off, go to
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com
December 12

Sandra

messages.subject: Sandra on Alan Colmes
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to give props to you, Sandra, for the great job you did last night on the Alan Colmes radio show. It must have been frustrating not being able to
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to give props to you, Sandra, for the great job you did
last night on the Alan Colmes radio show.

It must have been frustrating not being able to string 3 sentences
together without getting interrupted.

I was pleased that the callers I heard agreed with you, that
unschooling made intuitive sense to them.

I am so grateful we have you as a spokesperson for unschooling!

Jennie
